title: Chileans lose faith amid church sex abuse scandal
text:
Chileans lose faith amid church sex abuse scandal 8:03pm GMT - 01:28 
To understand why Chile, one of Latin America’s most socially conservative nations, is losing faith in the Roman Catholic Church, Reuters visits Providencia, a middle-class area of Santiago coming to terms with a decades-old clergy sex abuse scandal. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
